extract_opts.desc: extract optimization flags and parameters from a compiler for autotuning (currently from GCC sources)

extract_opts_new.desc: extract optimization flags and parameters from a compiler for autotuning (currently from GCC --help:optimizers and sources)

extract_to_pipeline.desc: prepare compiler flag choices for universal tuning via program pipeline (experimental workflow)
